attributes.action: Stop the crazy guidelines surrounding school events and parents attendance!
attributes.additional_details: Put an end to the madness!
attributes.background:
Exams cancelled
Christmas plays cancelled
Sports days cancelled
So many events and opportunities gone!
So much has been missed because of this pandemic. The rule about bubbles is ludicrous. All children in said bubbles are going home to the parents and siblings mixing the bubbles anyway.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do differently.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You might be interested to know that the Government have made clear that decisions on sports days are a matter for schools:

https://dfemedia.blog.gov.uk/2021/06/18/can-sports-days-go-ahead-and-will-i-be-able-to-attend-we-answer-your-questions/
